workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.2660429599148037 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.127259604627891 --weight-decay 0.0008647941907105892 --lr 0.000787558565848709 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 163347 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.0797769759410655 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
